content: That sounds like a great system! I'm definitely going to implement the color-coded organization and utilize vertical space. I'm also thinking of using storage bins to store my winter clothes, since I still have a few boxes that I need to put away. Speaking of winter clothes, I just remembered that I lent my green sweater to my sister on January 25th and I hope she returns it soon. Do you think it's a good idea to have a designated spot in my closet for items that are currently being borrowed or loaned out?
